headline: Invesco Mortgage Capital Inc. Announces Quarterly Common Dividend and Transition to Monthly Common Dividends Beginning in January 2026
summary: Invesco Mortgage Capital Inc. (the "Company") (NYSE: IVR) today announced that its Board of Directors declared a cash dividend of $0.36 per share of common stock for the fourth quarter of 2025. The dividend will be paid on January 23, 2026 to stockholders of record at the close of business on December 29, 2025, with an ex-dividend date of December 29, 2025.

headline: Deutsche upgrades Invesco to Buy on better organic growth
summary: Deutsche Bank upgraded Invesco (IVZ) to Buy from Hold with a price target of $31, up from $26. The company is positioned for better organic growth and has a product lineup that should post at least low- to mid-single digit asset under management growth rates “more reliably,” the analyst tells investors in a research note. Deutsche believes Invesco’s “resilience” in exchanged traded funds and indexes will help its flows going forward. Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium and Invest with Confidence Unlo

headline: JPMorgan Quants Warn of ‘Extreme Crowding’ in Speculative Stocks
summary: The list includes Broadcom Inc., Advanced Micro Devices Inc., Expedia Group Inc., Estee Lauder Cos Inc., Invesco Ltd. and Nucor Corp.  The selloff has been led by tech shares as investors rotate out of winners — an event the JPMorgan quants warned about.

headline: Invesco Stock: Is IVZ Outperforming the Financial Sector?
summary: Despite Invesco’s strong outperformance relative to the broader financial sector over the past year, analysts continue to strike a cautious tone on the stock’s forward outlook.
